subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: George McNeill, a 32-year-old rookie, won his first career PGA Tour title, shooting a five-under-par 67 for a 23-under 264 total and a four-stroke victory over D. J. Trahan at the Frys.com Open in Las Vegas. McNeill earned $720,000 for the victory in a tournament that did not feature one top-20 player.
